name: Attack at the Academy
description:
"Attack at the Academy"

Created for "Fighting Jam #001"

Step into the shoes of Ren, a shy art student at the Art Academy, as he takes on an unexpected challenge. Help Ren overcome his fears as he battles against art pieces that have mysteriously come to life. 

PLAYER 1 
MOVEMENT - W A S D
ATTACK - J
SPECIAL - K
THROW - L
JUMP - SPACE
BLOCK - LEFT SHIFT

PLAYER 2
MOVEMENT - ARROW KEYS
ATTACK - INS
SPECIAL - HOME
THROW - PAGE UP
JUMP - DEL
BLOCK - END

Made with Unity + Universal Fighting Engine

A downloadable version for Windows is also available
